item.title: volatile.sh v1.0.0 - Initial Public Launch
item.description: volatile.sh is now publicly available! Zero-knowledge secret sharing with AES-256-GCM encryption, burn-after-reading functionality, flexible TTL options, rate limiting, RESTful API, fully open-source (MIT licensed), and self-hosting support via Cloudflare Workers.
item.content:encoded:
Initial Public Launch

volatile.sh is now publicly available! Here's what we're launching with:

  • Zero-knowledge secret sharing with AES-256-GCM encryption
  • Burn-after-reading functionality
  • Flexible TTL options (5 minutes to 7 days)
  • Rate limiting to prevent abuse
  • RESTful API for programmatic access
  • Fully open-source (MIT licensed)
  • Self-hosting support via Cloudflare Workers

Read more at the changelog.
